ALERT_MESSAGE: Please open the serial port before sending. You can click the "open serial port" below or the switch in the upper right corner to open the serial port
CLICK_THE_COLOR_BELOW_TO_SWITCH_THE_BACK: Click the color to switch background color
HELP_CONTENT:
USPT (USB Serial Port Tool. The USB serial port communication tool) is a tool for communication debugging of common USB (including Type-C) to serial devices on the Android side.

Currently USPT supports most USB serial port drivers on the market, including Cdc/Ch34/Cp21xx/Ftdi/Prolific common chip drivers.

If you encounter problems during use, or if you have better suggestions for improvement, please email me directly.

Email address: king6180@gmail.com

USPT thank you Use of
